duties_responsibilities.duty: Create and drive product vision and roadmap based on customer research, business capability, and technical feasibility.
Work closely with UX/UI, Product Owners, and Engineering teams to deliver product and customer experience strategies.
Establish relationships with stakeholder groups across marketing, sales, product segments, and customer advocacy to ensure alignment on product vision and strategy.
Prioritize product features and categorize into key delivery milestones and releases.
Gather and analyze qualitative and quantitative data to influence product features and prioritization.
Define targets for success and continually review analytics, the competitive landscape, and evolving customer needs.
Capture and document business and/or product requirements.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent education and 8+ years related experience as a product manager and/or equivalent role.
Experience with at least one of the major product management software systems (example: JIRA, Asana, Trello, etc.)
